title: Melvor Game Data Package
description: A game data package for Melvor Idle

namespace.description: Unique namespace for the game data. For Modded Data Packages, this is defined by the manifest.json and has no effect.

conditions.description: Array of conditions of which every one must be met
Array of conditions of which any one must be met

condition.description: The condition that must be matched for the modifiers provided to be active

modifiers.description: Modifiers provided to the player if the condition is met

enemyModifiers.description: Modifiers provided to the enemy if the condition is met

rewardItemIDs.description: An array of item IDs that will be rewarded when the dungeon is completed

magnitude.description: For modifiers, determines the base value of the modifier. For effect applicators, determines the base multiplier for the applicator's chance.

applicator.description: Optional. If present this effect applicator will be merged with the character, with chances multiplied by the magnitude

modifiers.description: Optional. If present these modifier will be applied to the player, with a value equal to the magnitude

modifier.description: Optional. If present this modifier will be applied to the player, with a base value equal to the magnitude

modifiers.description: Optional. If present these modifier will be applied to the enemy, with a value equal to the magnitude

modifier.description: Optional. If present this modifier will be applied to the enemy, with a base value equal to the magnitude

FixedCost.description: A fixed cost per purchase in the shop

cost.description: The cost per purchase. Can be set to 0 to indicate no cost.

LinearCost.description: A linearly scaling cost per purchase in the shop

initial.description: The cost of the first purchase

scaling.description: The amount the cost should increase per purchase made

BankSlotCost.description: A cost that scales according the bank slot cost formula per purchase in the shop

GloveCost.description: A fixed cost that can be reduced if the player has read the merchant's permit

currencies.description: Optional. Array of currency costs of the purchase

items.description: Array of Item costs of the purchase

type.description: Type for item, utilized for searching

media.description: URI of the item's image

mediaAnimation.description: Optional. If present, provides the URI for an animated image of the item

altMedia.description: URI of an alternative image for the item

ignoreCompletion.description: Determines if the item should not count for item completion

obtainFromItemLog.description: Determines if the item should be obtainable by clicking on it in the item log

golbinRaidExclusive.description: Determines if the item should only show up in the Golbin Raid Minigame

customDescription.description: Optional. If present, the item will use this description instead of the default autogenerated one.

sellsForCurrency.description: Optional. Determines which currency this item sells for. Defaults to GP.

sellsFor.description: Base sale price for the item

isArtefact.description: Determines if the item is an Artefact obtained from Archaeology

isGenericArtefact.description: Optional. Determines if the item is a Generic Artefact obtained from Archaeology that can be exchanged for Museum Tokens

isDebug.description: Optional. Flags the item as a Debuggin item that is only to be loaded if DEBUGENABLED is true. Defaults to false.

id.description: The ID of the item to modify

category.description: Category for item, utilized for searching

type.description: Type for item, utilized for searching

obtainFromItemLog.description: Determines if the item should be obtainable by clicking on it in the item log

sellsFor.description: Base sale price for the item

key.description: The equipment stat that is provided

value.description: The value of the equipment stat provided

key.description: The equipment stat that is provided

value.description: The value of the equipment stat provided

damageType.description: Optional. The damage type of the stat. Defaults to melvorD:Normal

tier.description: Classification for the tier of item. Currently only effects which items can be converted to Clothing in township

validSlots.description: The valid equipment slots that this item can be equipped to.

occupiesSlots.description: Equipment slots that will also be occupied by this item, in addition to one of the validSlots. Typical usecase is to make a weapon 2-Handed

cantEquipWith.description: Optional. The IDs of Equipment Items that this item cannot be equipped with at the same time

equipRequirements.description: Array of requirements that are needed in order to equip this item

equipmentStats.description: Equipment stats that are provided by this item. Do not apply if item is in the Passive slot.

specialAttacks.description: Optional. An array of Special Attack IDs that are provided when the item is equipped.

overrideSpecialChances.description: Optional. If present with the specialAttacks property, overrides their default chances to happen. Must be the same length as specialAttacks.

providedRunes.description: Optional. An array of runes that are provided by this item.

ammoType.description: Only required if one of the validSlots for this item is Quiver. Specifies the types of weapons this item can supply with ammunition.

consumesChargesOn.description: Optional. Only utilized if this item participates in the Item Charges subsystem. Specifies an array of GameEventMatchers, which on a successful match will consume a single item charge.

consumesOn.description: Optional. Specifies an array of GameEventMatchers, which on a successful match will consume one of the equipped item. Best utilized for the Quiver, Summon1, Summon2, and Consumable slots.

consumesItemOn.description: Optional. If present, specifies that an item in the bank will be consumed if a successful GameEvent matches

itemID.description: The ID of the item in the bank to be consumed

chance.description: The percentage chance that the item is consumed when an event matches

matchers.description: Specifies an array of GameEventMatchers, which on a successful match will roll to consume an item from the bank.

deathPenaltyPriority.description: Optional. If present sets the priority of losing this item when dying. Higher priority indicates the item will be lost before others. Defaults to 0.

tier.description: Classification for the tier of item. Currently only effects which items can be converted to Clothing in township

validSlots.description: The valid equipment slots that this item can be equipped to.

occupiesSlots.description: Equipment slots that will also be occupied by this item, in addition to one of the validSlots. Typical usecase is to make a weapon 2-Handed

equipRequirements.description: Requirements that are needed to be met in order to equip this item

equipmentStats.description: Equipment stats that are provided by this item. Do not apply if item is in the Passive slot.

specialAttacks.description: Special Attack IDs that are provided when the item is equipped.

overrideSpecialChances.description: If present with the specialAttacks property, overrides their default chances to happen. Must be the same length as specialAttacks. Set to null to use default special attack chances.

providedRunes.description: Runes that are provided by this item.

ammoType.description: Only required if one of the validSlots for this item is Quiver. Specifies the types of weapons this item can supply with ammunition. Set to null to remove ammoType.

consumesOn.description: Optional. Adds/Removes from an array of GameEventMatchers, which on a successful match will consume one of the equipped item. Best utilized for the Quiver, Summon1, Summon2, and Consumable slots.

add.description: Adds new ways this item can be consumed

remove.description: Removes all ways this item can be consumed of the given type of GameEventMatcher

attackType.description: Determines which combat style this weapon enables the player to use

ammoTypeRequired.description: Optional. If present this weapon requires an item to be equipped in the Quiver with a matching AmmoType to attack

damageType.description: Optional. The ID of the damage type this Weapon deals. Defaults to Normal.

attackType.description: Determines which combat style this weapon enables the player to use

ammoTypeRequired.description: This weapon requires an item to be equipped in the Quiver with a matching AmmoType to attack. Set to null to not consume ammo.

healsFor.description: The base healing value of the food. Specified as 1/10th of the desired value in Standard Mode.
The base healing value of the food. Specified as 1/10th of the desired value in Standard Mode.

prayerPoints.description: The base number of prayer points obtained by burying the item
The base number of prayer points obtained by burying the item

soulPoints.description: The base number of soul points obtained by excercizing the item
The base number of soul points obtained by excercizing the item

charges.description: The base quantity of charges the potion provides per use

tier.description: The tier of the potion. Utilized to determine requirements for upgrading potions, and for filtering in the potion select menu.

action.description: The ID of the Action that the potion can be utilized with.

consumesOn.description: An array of GameEventMatchers that when any are matched a single charge of the potion is consumed

charges.description: The base quantity of charges the potion provides per use

modalID.description: Optional. If present, specifies the Bootstrap 4 Modal HTMLElement-id in the DOM. This modal will be opened when the item is read. Has precendence over the swalData property

swalData.description: Optional. If present, specifies data for a SweetAlert2 modal to be fired.

title.description: Language string ID to use for the title text of the SweetAlert2 modal.

htmlTemplateID.description: Specifies the id of an HTMLTemplateElement in the DOM to use as the html for the SweetAlert2 modal.

dropTable.description: Defines the items that can be obtained by opening this item

keyItem.description: Optional. If present, this item is required to open the item. The quantity provided will be consumed per item opened.

dropTable.description: Defines the items that can be obtained by opening this item

keyItem.description: The item that is required to open this item. The quantity provided will be consumed per item opened. Set to null to remove requirement.

skill.description: The ID of the skill this token provides mastery pool XP to

realm.description: The realm that this token provides mastery pool XP to

percent.description: The percent of the mastery pool that this token fills

rollInSkill.description: Optional. If this item should be rolled for when the corresponding skill completes an action. Defaults to true.

compostValue.description: The percent value that using this item will fill the compost meter in farming by.

harvestBonus.description: The percent value that using this item will increase the quantity of crops harvested by.

buttonStyle.description: The CSS class that is applied to the compost, compost all, and compost max buttons in farming

barStyle.description: The CSS class that is applied to the compost meter when this item is applied to farming plots

disableSeedRefund.description: Whether using this Compost disables seed refunds on harvest.

compostAllCost.description: Optional. Sets the currency cost to apply this item to all farming plots. Defaults to 2000 GP

compostValue.description: The percent value that using this item will fill the compost meter in farming by.

harvestBonus.description: The percent value that using this item will increase the quantity of crops harvested by.

buttonStyle.description: The CSS class that is applied to the compost, compost all, and compost max buttons in farming

barStyle.description: The CSS class that is applied to the compost meter when this item is applied to farming plots

disableSeedRefund.description: Whether using this Compost disables seed refunds on harvest.

compostAllCost.description: Optional. Sets the currency cost to apply this item to all farming plots

subRunes.description: Optional. The runes that this rune is composed of. Used to define Combo runes

realm.description: Optional. The realm this rune belongs to. Defaults to melvorD:Melvor

modifiers.description: Modifiers that are applied to the Player when this oil is in use.

skillID.description: The ID of the skill to increase the level cap of

increase.description: The increase in level cap to give

maximum.description: The maximum level cap that can be reached with this increase

id.description: Unique identifier for this set within its parent object. Used for save encoding/decoding

requirements.description: The requirements that must be met for this set to trigger a skill cap increase

skillID.description: The ID of the skill

value.description: The value associated with the skill

SkillLevelCapIncreaseData.description: Data for constructing a SkillLevelCapIncrease object

levelType.description: Determines the type of level cap that is increased

requirementSets.description: Determines sets of requirements, that when met will trigger this level cap increase to be applied

fixedIncreases.description: Optional. Fixed increases to level caps given when a requirement set is met

randomIncreases.description: Optional. Random increases to level caps given when a requirement set is met. One element of this array will be chosen

randomCount.description: Optional. The number of random increases that will be given when a requirement set is met

setIncreases.description: Optional. Sets the level cap of a skill when a requirement set is met. Has no effect if the skill's level cap is already above the amount.

SkillLevelCapIncreaseModificationData.description: Data for modifying a SkillLevelCapIncrease object

requirementSets.description: Determines sets of requirements, that when met will trigger this level cap increase to be applied

fixedIncreases.description: Modifies fixed increases to level caps given when a requirement set is met

randomIncreases.description: Modifies random increases to level caps given when a requirement set is met. One element of this array will be chosen

setIncreases.description: Modifies level cap of a skill when a requirement set is met. Has no effect if the skill's level cap is already above the amount.

increase.description: The number of levels the cap will be increased by

baseCost.description: The base cost to increase the level cap

scalingFactor.description: The base to use to calculate the cost of a given purchase. Cost scales by scalingFactor^purchaseCount

maxCostScaling.description: The maximum scale that can be applied to the costs

skillLevelGates.description: Optional. If present, all of these skills must have a level above the new level cap to purchase an increase

baseGateLevel.description: Optional. Sets the base level cap that can be bought. Defaults to 0

GamemodeData.description: Data for constructing a Gamemode object

name.description: Display name of the Gamemode

media.description: URI of Gamemode icon

description.description: Optional. Description of the Gamemode displayed on the Character Select screen

rules.description: List of rules that are specific to the Gamemode. Displayed on the Character Select screen

textClass.description: CSS class used on the character select screen to specify the colour of the Gamemode's name

btnClass.description: CSS class used on the character select screen to specify the style of both Gamemode Selection and Created Characters

isPermaDeath.description: If true, dying in this Gamemode will delete the save file

isEvent.description: If true, a notice will be shown that this gamemode is Time limited on the character select screen

startDate.description: Optional. If present, respresents the Unix timestamp at which the Gamemode is available to play

endDate.description: Represents the Unix timestamp at which the Gamemode is no longer available to play. If set to 0, the Gamemode is always available.

combatTriangle.description: The combat triangle utilized in the Gamemode. 0 specifies the Standard Triangle. 1 specifies the Hardcore Triangle. 2 specifies the inverted Hardcore triangle.

hitpointMultiplier.description: All hitpoint and damage values will be multiplied by this value. The Standard value is 10.

hasRegen.description: Determines if the Player has passive hitpoint regeneration

capNonCombatSkillLevels.description: Determines if Non-Combat skills will be capped by the Player's combat level

startingPage.description: ID of the page that the game should change to after the Tutorial has been completed

startingItems.description: The items that the Player starts with upon completing the Tutorial

allowSkillUnlock.description: If the Gamemode allows for skills to be unlocked for a GP cost

startingSkills.description: Optional. Array of Skill IDs that the player should start with in the gamemode. If unset, the player starts with all skills.

skillUnlockCost.description: Array of GP costs to unlock new skills in the gamemode. If the number of skills unlocked exceeds the length of this array, the last element will be utilized as the cost. Has no effect if allowSkillUnlock is false.

playerModifiers.description: Optional. Modifiers that will be applied to the Player at all times

enemyModifiers.description: Optional. Modifiers that will be applied to all Enemies/Monsters

playerCombatEffects.description: Optional. Effect Applicators merged with the player in this Gamemode

enemyCombatEffects.description: Optional. Effect Applicators merged with the enemy in this Gamemode

hasTutorial.description: Determines if the Player has access to the tutorial on creating a new save

disabledModifiers.description: Optional. List of Modifiers that are disabled in the gamemode. Is not mechanically implemented, but will render modifiers as disabled.

defaultInitialLevelCap.description: Optional. If present, all skills will have an initial level cap equal to this value, except for the skills in initialLevelCaps

initialLevelCaps.description: Optional. If present, skills will start with these level caps in this Gamemode

defaultInitialAbyssalLevelCap.description: Optional. If present, all skills will have an initial abyssal level cap equal to this value, except for the skills in initialAbyssalLevelCaps

initialAbyssalLevelCaps.description: Optional. If present, skills will start with these level caps in this Gamemode

levelCapIncreases.description: Optional. Determines which level cap increases are applied during this gamemode

levelCapCost.description: Optional. If present, the level caps of skills can be increased by purchasing them

abyssalLevelCapCost.description: Optional. If present, the abyssal level caps of skills can be increased by purchasing them

allowXPOverLevelCap.description: Optional. Determines if the player can continue to gain XP over the level cap.

disablePreservation.description: Optional. If set to true, all forms of preservation (Items, Runes, Ammo, Prayer Points, Summoning Tablets, Food, Potion Charges, Dig Site Map Actions) will be disabled

disableItemDoubling.description: Optional. If set to true, all forms of item doubling will be disabled

hasActiveGameplay.description: Optional. If set to true, a warning that the gamemode may require active gameplay to progress will be shown on the character select screen.

allowAncientRelicDrops.description: Optional. If set to true, ancient relics can be dropped by skills. Only available if the Atlas of Discovery expansion is installed.

useDefaultSkillUnlockRequirements.description: Optional. Determines if default skill unlock requirements will be used. Defaults to false.

skillUnlockRequirements.description: Optional. Custom skill unlock requirements for this gamemode. Overrides skill default values

skillID.description: The ID of the skill to set unlock requirements for

requirements.description: The requirements that must be met for the skill to unlock

enableInstantActions.description: Optional. If set to true, all actions in game will be performed instantly on a click.

enabledLangs.description: Optional. Array of languages required to see the gamemode. If unset, all languages can see the gamemode.

pre99RollConversion.description: Optional. ID of a SkillLevelCapIncrease that will convert the old pre 99 roll save data

post99RollConversion.description: Optional. ID of a SkillLevelCapIncrease that will convert the old post 99 roll save data

GamemodeModificationData.description: Data for modifying a Gamemode object

id.description: The ID of the gamemode to modify

levelCapIncreases.description: Adds or removes level cap increases from the gamemode

levelCapCost.description: Optional. If present, the level caps of skills can be increased by purchasing them

abyssalLevelCapCost.description: Optional. If present, the abyssal level caps of skills can be increased by purchasing them

pre99RollConversion.description: Optional. ID of a SkillLevelCapIncrease that will convert the old pre 99 roll save data

post99RollConversion.description: Optional. ID of a SkillLevelCapIncrease that will convert the old post 99 roll save data

startingSkills.description: Adds or removes starting skills from the gamemode

AttackStyleData.description: Data for constructing an AttackStyle object

experienceGain.description: Experience that is gained when dealing damage with this attack style

skillID.description: The ID of the skill that should gain experience

ratio.description: The amount of experience gained per hitpoint multiplier normalized point of damage dealt.

attackType.description: The combat style the Player can use this attack style with

name.description: The display name of the attack style

operator.description: The comparison operation to perform between the left-hand and right-hand values

lhValue.description: left-hand value to use in the comparison

rhValue.description: right-hand value to use in the comparison

CombatBehaviourTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a CombatBehaviourTrigger

condition.description: Optional. Defines a condition that must be true for the behaviour to execute from this trigger

EndOfTurnTriggerData.description: Data used to construct an EndOfTurnTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs at the end of a characters turn.

target.description: Determines whether the behaviour executes at the end of the character's turn or their target's

HitWithAttackTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a HitWithAttackTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs when the character hits with an attack

MissedWithAttackTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a MissedWithAttackTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs when the character misses with an attack

HitByAttackTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a HitByAttackTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs when the character is hit by an attack

EvadedAttackTriggerData.description: Data used to construct an EvadedAttackTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs when the character evades an attack

PostAttackTriggerData.description: Data used to construct an PostAttackTrigger

WasAttackedTriggerData.description: Data used to construct an WasAttackedTrigger

EndOfFightTriggerData.description: Data used to construct an EndOfFightTrigger

PrayerPointUseTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a PrayerPointUseTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs whenever the player would use prayer points

EquipmentChangedTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a EquipmentChangedTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs whenever the player changes their current equipment

isNotEquipped.description: Optional. The IDs of equipment items the player must not have equipped for the behaviour to execute

isEquipped.description: Optional. The IDs of equipment items the player must have equipped for the behaviour to execute

ParameterChangedTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a ParameterChangedTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs when the specified parameter on the active effect changes

StatsChangedTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a StatsChangedTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs when the specified statGroup on the active effect changes

statGroupName.description: The name of the stat group that changes

TimerFiredTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a TimerFiredTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs when the specified timer on the active effect fires

EffectAppliedTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a EffectAppliedTrigger

EffectReappliedTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a EffectReappliedTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs when the effect is applied to a character, but is already active

EffectRemovedTriggerData.description: Data used to construct a EffectRemovedTrigger

type.description: Defines a behaviour trigger that occurs just before the effect is removed from a character

CombatEffectBehaviourData.description: Data used to construct a CombatEffectBehaviour

triggersOn.description: Array of triggers that determine when this behaviour is executed

chance.description: Optional. Determines the chance that this behaviour is executed when a trigger occurs. Defaults to 100.

priority.description: Optional. Specifies the priority of executing this behaviour. Higher values will be executed before lower values. Defaults to 0

InterruptTurnBehaviourData.description: Data used to construct an InterruptTurnBehaviour

type.description: Defines a Combat effect behaviour that interrupts the characters turn, resetting their action timer and cancelling any special attacks they were performing

ProcessEffectApplicatorBehaviourData.description: Data used to construct an ProcessEffectApplicatorBehaviour

type.description: Defines a Combat effect behaviour that processes an effect applicator via the character the effect is applied to when executed

applicator.description: Data for an effect Applicator that is processed when the behaviour is executed

RemoveEffectBehaviourData.description: Data used to construct a RemoveEffectBehaviour

ModifyBehaviourData.description: Data used to construct a ModifyBehaviour

newValue.description: The new value to set the existing value to

type.description: Defines a Combat Effect Behaviour that modifies the value of a stat group on the ActiveCombatEffect. This will automatically change the stats given to the character.

value.description: The amount of damage to deal to the charater's barrier

HealCharacterBehaviourData.description: Data used to construct a HealCharacterBehaviour

type.description: Defines a Combat Effect Behaviour that heals the character's hitpoints.

value.description: The amount of hitpoints to heal the character

HealBarrierBehaviourData.description: Data used to construct a HealBarrierBehaviour

type.description: Defines a Combat Effect Behaviour that heals the character's barrier.

value.description: The amount of barrier to add to the character

StartTimerBehaviourData.description: Data used to construct a StartTimerBehaviour

type.description: Defines a Combat Effect Behaviour that starts the specified timer on the ActiveCombatEffect

timerName.description: The name of the timer to start

value.description: Value of interval to start the timer with in [ms]

StopTimerBehaviourData.description: Data used to construct a StopTimerBehaviour

timerName.description: The name of the timer to stop

updateTo.description: The value to set the Unholy Prayer multiplier to

ApplyCorruptionBehaviourData.description: Data used to construct an ApplyCorruptionBehaviour

type.description: Defines a Combat Effect Behaviour that applies a random unlocked corruption effect

name.description: The name of the damage group

damage.description: The damage that will be reduced using the character that applied the effect

applyDamageModifiers.description: Optional. If damage modifiers from the character that applied the effect should be applied. Defaults to false.

applyTypeModifiers.description: Optional. If present, DOTType modifiers will be applied to the calculation of the damage

applyResistance.description: Optional. If damage reduction from the character the effect is applied to should be applied. Uses the source character of the effect to determine damage reduction type.

damageCap.description: Optional. The maximum damage that this damage group can compute to. Applies before resistance, but after damage modifiers. Scaled by hpMultiplier

name.description: The name of the stat group

modifiers.description: Optional. Modifiers that can be applied to the character the effect is active on

combatEffects.description: Optional. An array of combat effect applicators to merge with the character the effect is active on

className.description: Optional. CSS classes that are added to the span

character.description: Optional. If present, the character the effect is applied to must be of the given type for the span to display

condition.description: Optional. If present, this condition must be met in order for the span to display

type.description: A tooltip span that displays a lang string. Can be templated.

langID.description: ID of the language string to display

templateData.description: Optional. If present the language string will be templated by the values specified

type.description: A tooltip span that displays the string value specified. Can be templated.

templateData.description: Optional. If present the string will be templated by the values specified.

type.description: A tooltip span that displays the currently applied values of a stat group

statGroupName.description: The name of the stat group to display

type.description: A tooltip span that displays turns differently based on the type

turns.description: The value to use for the number of turns left

type.description: A tooltip span that displays stacks and max stacks

stacks.description: The value to use for the current amount of stacks

maxStacks.description: The value to use for the maximum number of stacks

CombatEffectGroupData.description: Data used to construct a CombatEffectGroup

name.description: The display name of this effect group for use in modifiers

nameLang.description: Optional. Language string to use for the name of this effect group

adjective.description: Adjective describing the state of a character impacted by this effect group (e.g. Burning). Used to generate descriptions.

currentValue.description: Value to use for the current amount of progress

maxValue.description: Value to use for the maximum amount of progress

barStyle.description: CSS class to apply to the progress bar to determine its background colour

fullStyles.description: CSS classes to apply to the progress bar when it is full

initialParameters.description: Record of template prefix to a value based on initial parameters. Value can reference the name of a parameter, or an equation composed of parameters

statGroups.description: Record of template prefix to stat group name. String template data will be generated for each value of modifiers in the group, prefixed by `${prefix}modValue${i}`, where i is the order of the modifier in the group

damageGroups.description: Record of template prefix to damage group name. String template data will be generate for each element of the damage array in the group, prefixed by the key

BaseCombatEffectData.description: Partial Data used to construct a CombatEffect.

name.description: Name of the effect to display in the effect's tooltip

nameLang.description: ID of the language string to use for the name of the effect

media.description: URI for the icon displayed when the effect is active

turnText.description: Optional. If present this value will be rendered in the bottom-right corner of the effect's icon.

tooltipSpans.description: Defines spans that will be displayed in the tooltip of the effect

tooltipMergeMode.description: Optional. Specifies how the tooltipSpans prop will be merged with existing ones from templates. Defaults to Replace.

progressBar.description: Optional. If present this effect will render a progress bar under the character's hitpoints, and a larger progress icon next to the numeric hitpoints

noIcon.description: Optional. If true, this effect will not render an icon when it is active. Defaults to false

descriptionTemplateData.description: Determines the string template data that will be generated from this effect. Used to template special attack descriptions

target.description: Determines the default character the effect should be applied to when an applicator with this effect is processed.

name.description: The name of the parameter

initialValue.description: The default initial value of the parameter when an ActiveEffect is constructed

timers.description: Defines timers for the effect. Timers can be used as a trigger for behaviours.

name.description: The name of the timer

statGroups.description: Defines stat groups for the effect. Stat groups can be applied to the character the effect is active on.

damageGroups.description: Defines damage groups for the effect. Damage groups can be referenced as values in the effect.

behaviours.description: Defines behaviours for the effect. Behaviours will be executed in the order of definition, unless the priority property is set.

effectGroups.description: The IDs of effect groups that this effect belongs to.

exclusiveGroups.description: The IDs of effect groups that block the application of this effect if they are present on the character it is being applied to

CombatEffectTemplateData.description: Data used to construct a CombatEffectTemplate

description.description: Optional. Description with instructions on the use of this template

baseTemplates.description: Optional. Array of the IDs of templates to base this one on. Each will be merged together, in the order they appear, then the baseEffectData of this template will be merged ontop.

baseEffectData.description: The partial combat effect data that will be inherited by other templates/combat effects

CombatEffectData.description: Data used to construct a CombatEffect

TemplatedCombatEffectData.description: Data for constructing a CombatEffect from a CombatEffectTemplate

templateID.description: The ID of the CombatEffectTemplate to inherit data from

CombatEffectTableData.description: Data used to construct a CombatEffectTable

initialParams.description: Optional. Specifies overrides to the initial values of parameters in the active effect

weight.description: The relative weight of selecting this effect

type.description: Defines a condition for a CombatEffectApplicator that depends on the raw damage dealt during application

operator.description: Comparison operator to use between the raw damage dealt and the rhValue

rhValue.description: The right-hand value to use in the comparison. The left-hand value is set to the raw damage dealt.

type.description: Defines a condition for a CombatEffectApplicator that depends on the raw damage taken during application

rhValue.description: The right-hand value to use in the comparison. The left-hand value is set to the raw damage taken.

type.description: Defines a condition for a CombatEffectApplicator that depends on values of the character that is processing the applicator

lhValue.description: The left-hand value to use in the comparison.

rhValue.description: The right-hand value to use in the comparison.

conditions.description: Array of conditions of which every one must be met
Array of conditions of which any one must be met

CombatEffectApplicatorData.description: Data used to construct a CombatEffectApplicator

chance.description: Optional. Specifies the chance to apply an effect. Defaults to 100

condition.description: Optional. Specifies a condition that must be met for the effect to be applied

targetOverride.description: Optional. If present, the default target for the effect will be replaced with this.

bypassBarrier.description: Optional. Determines if the effect can be applied even when the target has barrier, if applying the effect from self to target. Defaults to false.

SingleCombatEffectApplicatorData.description: Data used to construct a SingleCombatEffectApplicator

effectID.description: The ID of the CombatEffect to apply

initialParams.description: Optional. Specifies overrides to the initial values of parameters in the active effect

TableCombatEffectApplicatorData.description: Data used to construct a TableCombatEffectApplicator

tableID.description: The ID of the CombatEffectTable to select an applicator from

appliesWhen.description: Specifies when an effect should be appled

applyEffectWhenMerged.description: Optional. Specifies if the effect should be applied when the applicator is merged. Defaults to false.

customDescription.description: Optional. Specifies a string which will be used as the description for this applicator. If set to an empty string, the applicator will have no description.

descriptionLang.description: Optional. Specifies the ID of a language string which will be used as the description for this applicator

isNegative.description: Optional. Specifies if this applicator's description should be formatted as negative. Defaults to false.

add.description: Adds a new effect applicator to the combatEffects array. Removals are processed before additions.

removeEffect.description: IDs of CombatEffects. Removes SingleCombatEffectApplicators that have an effect that matches the ID.

AttackData.description: Data for constructing a SpecialAttack object

defaultChance.description: The default percentage chance that this attack is chosen

damage.description: Array of damage that is reduced to determine the damage dealt per hit of this attack

prehitEffects.description: Effects that are applied before the attack rolls to hit

onhitEffects.description: Effects that are applied only when the attack hits

canNormalAttack.description: Optional. If true, this attack will be replaced by a normal attack if any of its pre-hit or on-hit effects are active. Defaults to false.

cantMiss.description: If the attack cannot miss the target

attackCount.description: The number of times this attack procs

lifesteal.description: The percentage of damage dealt by this attack that should heal the attacker

consumesEffect.description: Optional. If present this attack will remove the given effect from the target character, and increase its attack count by the effects paremeter value

effectID.description: The ID of the CombatEffect to try and remove

paramName.description: The name of the parameter to increase the attacks hit count by

name.description: Display name of the triangle set

media.description: URI of icon to display for this triangle set

Standard.description: Determines the combat triangle when playing Gamemodes that use the Standard Triangle

Hardcore.description: Determines the combat triangle when playing Gamemodes that use the Hardcore Triangle

InvertedHardcore.description: Determines the combat triangle when playing Gamemodes that use the Inverted Hardcore Triangle

col.description: The column in the grid. Must be between [0, 4]

row.description: The row in the grid. Must be an integer. 0 is where the Helmet slot is placed.

allowQuantity.description: If this slot allows a quantity of an item to be equipped to it

emptyMedia.description: The icon to display when the slot is empty

emptyName.description: The name to show when the slot is empty

providesEquipStats.description: If items equipped in this slot provide equipment stats

gridPosition.description: Determines the position of this slot in the equipment grid

alternativePositions.description: Optional. Alternative positions to place this slot in if the initial grid position is already used.

requirements.description: Optional. Requirements the player must meet to use this slot. Ignored in Golbin Raid.

id.description: The ID of the Equipment Slot to modify

allowQuantity.description: If this slot allows a quantity of an item to be equipped to it

providesEquipStats.description: If items equipped in this slot provide equipment stats

gridPosition.description: Determines the position of this slot in the equipment grid

requirements.description: Optional. Requirements the player must meet to use this slot. Ignored in Golbin Raid.

remove.description: Removes all requirements of the given types

id.description: The ID of the Damage Type to modify

immuneTo.description: Optional. Specifies what damage types this is immune to.

remove.description: Removes imunity to all of the given damage types

name.description: The name of the Realm

media.description: The icon that is displayed for the Realm

unlockRequirements.description: These requirements must be met to unlock the Realm.

showIfLocked.description: Optional. Whether to display this Realm at all if locked. Defaults to true.

ignoreCompletion.description: Optional. Whether mastery actions ignore completion. Defaults to false.

sidebarClass.description: Optional. The class name applied to the sidebar when inside the realm

realmClass.description: Optional. The class name applied to the Skill's current realm header when inside the realm

name.description: The name of the damage type

media.description: The icon that is displayed for the damage type and resistance

resistanceName.description: Custom name for the resistance to this damage type

resistanceCap.description: The max allowed resistance from gear and stats

immuneTo.description: List of damage type IDs that this damage type is immune to

spanClass.description: The class that is used for damage type text spans

onlyShowIfUsing.description: Optional. If this damage type should only be displayed to the player if using.

skillID.description: Optional. The ID of the skill this scope applies to

damageTypeID.description: Optional. The ID of the damage type this scope applies to

realmID.description: Optional. The ID of the realm this scope applies to

currencyID.description: Optional. The ID of the currency this scope applies to

categoryID.description: Optional. The ID of the skill category this scope applies to

actionID.description: Optional. The ID of the skill action this scope applies to

subcategoryID.description: Optional. the ID of the skill subcategory this scope applies to

itemID.description: Optional. The ID of the item this scope applies to

effectGroupID.description: Optional. The ID of the combat effect group this scope applies to

key.description: The old modifier key that is an alias for this modifier

text.description: The template string to use for the description

lang.description: Optional. ID of the language string to use in lieu text

above.description: Optional. If present, the value of the modifier must be above this for this description to be used

below.description: Optional. If present, the value of the modifier must be below this for this description to be used

includeSign.description: Optional. If a `+/-` sign should be included before the `${value}`. Defaults to true.

inverted.description: Optional. If present, this description's positive/negative formatting will be opposite to the modifier's. Defaults to false.

scope.description: Optional. If present, this description will only apply to modifiers within the given scope

skill.description: Optional. If this scoping applies to a specific skill. Defaults to false.

damageType.description: Optional. If this scoping applies to a specific damage type. Defaults to false.

realm.description: Optional. If this scoping applies to a specific realm. Defaults to false.

currency.description: Optional. If this scoping applies to a specific currency. Defaults to false.

category.description: Optional. If this scoping applies to a specific skill category. Requires the skill scope. Defaults to false.

action.description: Optional. If this scoping applies to a specific skill action. Requires the skill scope. Defaults to false.

subcategory.description: Optional. If this scoping applies to a specific skill subcategory. Requires the skill scope. Defaults to false.

item.description: Optional. If this scoping applies to a specific Item

effectGroup.description: Optional. If this scoping applies to a specific combat effect group

scopes.description: The specific scopes allowed by this modifier

scopeSource.description: Optional. Determines the source for action and category scopes for this scoping.

descriptions.description: The descriptions to use for the modifier in this scope

posAliases.description: Optional. Aliases for positive values in this scope. Used for backwards compatability with old data format

negAliases.description: Optional. Aliases for negative values in this scope. Used for backwards compatability with old data format

scopes.description: Determines which scope to modify, or add if it does not already exist

descriptions.description: Optional. Descriptions to add to this scope. Required if adding a new scope.

posAliases.description: Optional. Aliases for positive values to add to this scope

negAliases.description: Optional. Aliases for negative values to add to this scope

inverted.description: Optional. If negative values of this modifier should be treated as positive and vice versa. Defaults to false.

allowPositive.description: Optional. If this modifier is allowed to have positive values. Defaults to true.

allowNegative.description: Optional. If this modifier is allowed to have negative values. Defaults to true.

isCombat.description: Optional. If this modifier causes a change in combat stats when changed. Defaults to false.

allowEnemy.description: Optional. If this modifier can be applied to enemies in combat. Defaults to false.

modifyValue.description: Optional. An expression that is applied to the modifier's value before it is described

allowedScopes.description: Determines which scopes this modifier can belong to

ModifierModificationData.description: Data for modifying a Modifier instance

allowedScopes.description: Adds or modifies an existing scopes belonging to this modifier
